features.name: QR Signature Management Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard for QR signature management system with live statistics, tab navigation, and comprehensive record management

features.name: QR Code Generator
features.description: QR code generation page for creating single or bulk QR codes for employee check-in/check-out with location selection

features.name: Signature Page
features.description: Public signature page that opens when QR code is scanned, allows employees to sign for check-in/check-out

features.name: System Signature Page
features.description: System-level signature page for administrative QR code signatures

features.name: Live Location Map
features.description: Component for displaying live location data on a map

features.name: Advanced Analytics
features.description: Advanced analytics component for displaying usage statistics and trends

features.name: Signature Detail Modal
features.description: Modal component for displaying detailed signature information

features.name: Reporting Dashboard
features.description: Component for generating and exporting reports (daily, weekly, monthly)

features.name: Export Utilities
features.description: Utility functions for exporting data to PDF, Excel, and CSV formats

features.name: API Configuration
features.description: API configuration and axios instance setup for making HTTP requests

features.name: Attendance QR Routes
features.description: Backend routes for QR code generation, signature submission, and attendance tracking

features.name: System QR Routes
features.description: Backend routes for system-level QR code management

features.name: App Routing
features.description: Main application routing configuration including QR signature management routes

features.name: Authentication Context
features.description: Authentication context provider for managing user authentication state
